00059      MESQUITE_EXPORT AveragingQM( QualityMetric::AveragingMethod method ) :
00060        avgMethod(method)
00061      {}
00062      
00064      MESQUITE_EXPORT inline 
00065      void set_averaging_method( QualityMetric::AveragingMethod method )
00066       { avgMethod = method; }
00067       
00068      MESQUITE_EXPORT inline
00069      void set_averaging_method( QualityMetric::AveragingMethod method, MsqError& )
00070       { set_averaging_method(method); }
00071     
00072      MESQUITE_EXPORT inline 
00073      QualityMetric::AveragingMethod get_averaging_method() const
00074       { return avgMethod; }
00075      
00078      inline bool analytical_average_gradient() 
00079       { return avgMethod <= QualityMetric::LAST_WITH_GRADIENT; }
00080 
00083      inline bool analytical_average_hessian() 
00084       { return avgMethod <= QualityMetric::LAST_WITH_HESSIAN; }
